content.description: Start matched on the sloper your left hand is on when starting Palmaid. Climb up and left on good holds the whole time making sure your back doesn't touch the rock behind you.
SDS. bear hug the crap out of the start. take turns slapping your left hand up the left side and you right hand up the right side. if wrestling the buffalo had a crazy sibling, this would be it.
content.location: while technically not at the quarter-ways i wasn't sure where to put it so here it is. when walking from the south seas to baldy you will pass this problem about 100yards after you pass wayward valley.

content.description: This fun problem start with both hands palming the boulder. Use some foot trickery to get to the massive jug on top.
content.location: Uphill and just ever so slightly to the right of The Duchess Boulder is this boulder. Palmaid is on the backside.

content.description: On the frontside of the Palmaid Boulder is this short but still fun problem. Start with your left hand on an obvious sloper and right on a sloper six inches to the right of your left hand. Smear your feet on the wall and go straight up.
content.location: Uphill about 50 feet and just slightly right of The Duchess Boulder.

content.description: This great problem starts with your right hand on the right corner and left low on a left seem. Slap up using tricky feet to a jug top out.
content.location: This problem is located just uphill and left of The Duchess. The Darkness Turns To Light cave is just to your left.

content.description: This new area has many easy problems and some harder problems as well. They are good and have, for the most part, great landings. Check them out.
